title: Its All About Growth ( Omar Epps and Charles Murray)
itunes:title: Its All About Growth ( Omar Epps and Charles Murray)
description:
Today on the show we had Omar Epps and Charles Murray stop by, and speak on the progression of black cinema, Mental Health Themes, and their new film "The Devil You Know". Aftewards, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a sociology teacher for bullying a student for refusing to participate in the pledge of allegiance. Also, since Angela is away, it was time for Ask C and E where Envy and Charlamagne try to give their best advice to our listeners, and they had one listener who doesnt know how to leave a guy becaue of his "good good" in the bedroom.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Today on the show we had Omar Epps and Charles Murray stop by, and speak on the progression of black cinema, Mental Health Themes, and their new film "The Devil You Know". Aftewards, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a sociology teacher for bullying a student for refusing to participate in the pledge of allegiance. Also, since Angela is away, it was time for Ask C and E where Envy and Charlamagne try to give their best advice to our listeners, and they had one listener who doesnt know how to leave a guy becaue of his "good good" in the bedroom.
